import Task from './Task';

export default {

const Template = args => <Task {...args} />;

export const Default = Template.bind({});
Default.args = {

    state: 'TASK_INBOX',

export const Pinned = Template.bind({});

    ...Default.args.task,
    state: 'TASK_PINNED',

export const Archived = Template.bind({});
